name: Marigold Sweetwater
title: Innkeeper & Barkeep
description: A cheerful halfling with a warm smile and boundless energy. She runs The Grain & Grape with genuine hospitality, ensuring every guest feels like family.

greeting.first_time: Welcome to The Grain & Grape! I'm Marigold, your host. Whether you need a drink, a room, or a stage to perform on, I've got you covered!
greeting.returning: Welcome back, dear! What can I do for you today?
greeting.tired: You look exhausted! Perhaps a room and a good night's rest?

sleeping.text: *snoring softly* Zzz... *mumbles* ...fresh bread in the morning... Zzz...

off_duty.text: Just taking a short break! The inn is open—help yourself downstairs!

main_menu.text: What brings you to The Grain & Grape?

buy_drink.text: I've got cold beer fresh from the cellar. Take a look!

ask_rent_room.text: A room for the night costs 50 gold. Includes a comfortable bed and a hearty breakfast. Would you like to rent a room?

confirm_rent_room.success: Wonderful! Your room is upstairs, second door on the left. Sleep well!
confirm_rent_room.failure: I'm sorry, dear, but a room costs 50 gold. Come back when you have enough.

ask_about_shows.text: We have live music every night at 9 PM! All musicians are welcome here—we love a good performance! Shows vary by the day. You'll need your instruments, and bookings close at 8 PM. Want to see tonight's options?

see_available_shows.text: Let me check what's available tonight...
